Question: Shakespeare re-introduced part of the image, this person clutching the snake to her breast.
Hints: The relatively small number of ancestors can be seen from the possible ancestry of this person VII as shown below.
This person arrived in great state, and so charmed Antony that he chose to spend the winter of 41 BC–40 BC with her in Alexandria.
The high degree of inbreeding amongst the Ptolemies is also evident when one considers this person's immediate family.
